title: Client chat is not working
body:
Hello , i have been like this for 3 days or so ... my icon is not even appearing + can't access to my friendlist nor the champselect chat which is a huge disadvantage as a Diamond 3 player i can't swap or talk about invades or something , i really need help asap i tried repairing client didn't work .. the increase date by 1 day thing didn't work .. my internet is working fine hell i played my promos and won + an extra game with perfect connection .. so im sure its not because of my connection.
http://imgur.com/a/y6Oyd

replies.body: Same thing happening to me, I´m on a macbook pro, I did disable firewall and nothing, try it back on and still same problem. Tried the hextech and nothing... what else should i do? My network is woring fine, got another computer and i open same account there and it works just fine, so, i don´t know what else to do.
Yeah my chat isn't working either. Looks exactly like the picture shown above. Plz help me.
Hi! My client chat is not working am facing the same prob as nasus main were facing. Can someone guid me plz

This might be a connection problem that's struggling to reach pvp.net which is the chat service.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and find the block.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings incase that could be the culprit.  Hope that gets you squared away!

the hextech repair tool didn't work it tried it before and nothing happened , it said everything is okay,  i gave it another try after u suggested me to do so and same thing , nothing happened , what u mean with connection issues  .. i can login on my phone and everything working fine on the same internet connection so dunno...

Thanks for the update!  Even though your internet can seem fine, it doesn't make you immune from reaching specific servers- in this case pvp.net.  You'll want to go over each step to resolve whatever is causing you from failing to reach that.  Let me know if that clears things up!.
NVM I FIXED IT , thanks for your effort , its turned out to be a firewall thing , i disabled my wall and bam it worked.

i did most of them  (took alot of time tho) , but my norton antivirus expired so i just uninstalled it and after day or so this happened .. maybe this have something to do with this .. although i already made my firewall exception league and all it stuff .. its only pvp.net not connecting/something blocking it idk why.
